ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 13 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Nikon D5300 Digital SLR Camera Body (Black) + <2> Nikon 18-140mm VR DX AF-S Lens + <3> Samyang 500mm f/8 Mirror Lens +
<4> Transcend 32GB SDHC 300x Card + <5> PD Laptop/Tablet DSLR Backpack + <6> Spare EN-EL14 Battery +
<7> PD HDMI to Mini-HDMI Cable + <8> Precision Design ML-L3 Remote + <9> PD 8 SD Card Memory Card Case +
<10> LCD Screen Protectors + <11> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <12> T Mount for Nikon + <13> Instruction Sheet for T-Mount
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon D5300 Digital SLR Camera Body (Black) with 18-140mm VR Zoom & 500mm Mirror Lens + 32GB Card + Backpack + Battery Kit
